official_title: A bill relating to the construction of locks and dam No. 26, Mississippi River, Alton, Ill. and Missouri.

summary.text: Authorizes the construction of lock and dam numbered 26, Mississippi River, Alton, Illinois and Missouri by the Corps of Engineers.

titles.title: A bill relating to the construction of locks and dam No. 26, Mississippi River, Alton, Ill. and Missouri.
